description: Social media marketing specialist managing multi-platform content strategies, community engagement, analytics, and brand presence across Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, and emerging platforms

SKL-SMM-001.skill_phrase: managed cross-platform social media content strategies

SKL-SMM-002.skill_phrase: created viral short-form video content for TikTok and Reels

SKL-SMM-003.skill_phrase: analyzed social media performance metrics and optimized campaigns

SKL-SMM-004.skill_phrase: managed community engagement and response protocols

SKL-SMM-005.skill_phrase: repurposed content across multiple platform formats

SKL-SMM-006.skill_phrase: scheduled and coordinated multi-platform posting calendars

SKL-SMM-007.skill_phrase: tracked trending topics and adapted content strategies

SKL-SMM-008.skill_phrase: integrated AI tools ethically in content creation workflow

tool_details.TOOL-SMM-001: Instagram - PRIMARY platform (daily use) - Visual content and community
tool_details.TOOL-SMM-003: TikTok - PRIMARY platform (daily use) - Viral short-form video
tool_details.TOOL-SMM-007: LinkedIn - PRIMARY platform (daily use) - B2B and professional content
tool_details.TOOL-VID-001: YouTube - PRIMARY platform (weekly use) - Long-form video content
tool_details.TOOL-SMM-006: Twitter/X - SECONDARY platform (daily use) - Real-time engagement
tool_details.TOOL-SMM-004: Facebook - SECONDARY platform (daily use) - Community management
tool_details.TOOL-SMM-005: Pinterest - SECONDARY platform (weekly use) - Visual discovery
tool_details.TOOL-PUB-001: Medium - SECONDARY platform (weekly use) - Long-form content

workflow_details.WF-SMM-001: Cross-Platform Content Distribution - Maximize reach across platforms
workflow_details.WF-SMM-002: Content Repurposing Pipeline - Transform long-form to multiple variations
workflow_details.WF-SMM-003: Instagram Content Strategy - Educational carousels, reels, stories
workflow_details.WF-SMM-007: Short-Form Video Production - Daily TikTok, Reels, Shorts creation
workflow_details.WF-SMM-010: Facebook Community Management - Daily moderation and engagement

object_details.OBJ-SMM-001: Instagram DMs - Communication and customer engagement
object_details.OBJ-SMM-006: Instagram Story - Interactive Q&A, polls, BTS content
object_details.OBJ-SMM-007: TikTok Video - Short-form vertical video (15-60 seconds)
object_details.OBJ-SMM-009: YouTube Short - Vertical short-form video (60 seconds max)
object_details.OBJ-SMM-013: Facebook Group Post - Value-first community content

typical_tasks: Create 3-5 Instagram posts per week (carousels, reels, stories)
Produce 5-10 short-form videos daily (TikTok, Reels, Shorts)
Post daily LinkedIn content (articles, updates, engagement)
Manage Facebook Group with daily moderation and value posts
Monitor and respond to comments/DMs within platform-specific timeframes
Analyze performance metrics daily and optimize strategy
Repurpose long-form content into 15-20 platform variations
Schedule content across platforms using batching workflow
Track trending topics and adapt content strategy real-time
Create monthly performance reports with insights and recommendations

tiktok.content_mix: 40% quick tutorials, 30% trend adaptations, 20% BTS, 10% challenges
tiktok.frequency: 1-3 videos per day for algorithm favor

linkedin.content_mix: 25% thought leadership, 30% education, 20% case studies, 15% development, 10% updates
linkedin.key_metrics: Impressions, Engagement rate, Clicks, Lead generation

youtube.content_mix: 35% full tutorials, 25% shorts, 20% series, 10% lives, 10% collaborations
youtube.key_metrics: Watch time, Retention rate, CTR, Subscribers

facebook.content_mix: 40% group management, 30% page content, 20% challenges, 10% value posts
facebook.key_metrics: Member engagement, Posts per day, Retention

content_repurposing_strategy.step_1: Create primary long-form content (YouTube, Blog, Behance)
content_repurposing_strategy.step_3: Edit vertical versions for TikTok, Reels, Shorts
content_repurposing_strategy.step_4: Design visual summaries for Instagram carousels and Pinterest
content_repurposing_strategy.step_5: Write quick tips for Twitter and LinkedIn
content_repurposing_strategy.step_6: Create discussion posts for Facebook Groups
content_repurposing_strategy.step_8: Monitor performance and optimize based on data

performance_metrics.youtube_watch_time: Total minutes watched - primary YouTube metric

best_practices: Instagram: Create saveable educational content (5x algorithm weight)
TikTok: Hook within first 3 seconds - CRITICAL for completion
TikTok: Always add text overlays/captions (many watch without sound)
LinkedIn: Respond to comments within 2 hours to boost engagement
LinkedIn: Lead with ROI/results for B2B audience credibility
YouTube: Custom thumbnails A/B tested, keyword-first titles
YouTube: Always include captions for accessibility
Twitter: Thread numbering for clarity (1/7, 2/7, etc.)
Facebook: Native video uploads perform better than links
Facebook: Welcome new group members daily with personal message
Cross-platform: Batch content creation for efficiency
Cross-platform: Monitor analytics daily and optimize weekly
AI Integration: Always show human + AI collaboration workflow

ai_integration_approach.transparency: Always show human + AI collaboration in content
ai_integration_approach.process: Human concept → AI assistance → Human curation → Human refinement

platform_sensitivity.general: AI as assistant narrative, not replacement
platform_sensitivity.documentation: Screen record workflows showing human decisions

daily_monitoring: Check engagement metrics across all platforms
weekly_analysis: Adjust posting schedule based on data
Plan content calendar for next week

tools_and_software: Video editing (CapCut, Premiere Pro, Final Cut)
